General.Name: Southern Rubber Industry JSC
General.Description: The Southern Rubber Industry Joint Stock Company manufactures and trades in industrial and commercial rubber products in South East Asia and internationally. The company offers bicycle, motorcycle, truck, e-vehicle, and specific tires and tubes; passenger car radial tires; and ADVENZA PCR tires, as well as retread tires, gloves, and technical tires. It is also involved in trading, exporting, and importing of raw materials, chemicals, and rubber industrial equipment; trading of real estate; and the provision of business services. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
